phases.title: Environment Bootstrap
phases.goal: Create a fresh SvelteKit project with all dependencies
tasks: Delete old repo files if not needed
Run: `pnpm create svelte@latest quantum-rishi`
Enable TypeScript + ESLint + Prettier
Install: tailwindcss, postcss, autoprefixer, gsap, three, @tailwindcss/forms, lucide-svelte
Setup Tailwind config with dark mode 'class'
Add global styles: fonts (Space Grotesk, Inter, JetBrains Mono)

phases.title: Project Structure Setup
phases.goal: Create clean directory tree and layout files
tasks: Inside /src create folders: routes, lib/components, lib/styles, lib/data
In routes, create +layout.svelte and +layout.ts for global structure
Setup meta tags, favicon, OG image placeholders
Add /lib/styles/tokens.css with brand color variables

phases.title: Global Design System
phases.goal: Define consistent design tokens and base UI
tasks: In /lib/styles/tokens.css define primary, secondary, accent colors based on Quantum Rishi palette
Setup reusable Tailwind classes for card, button, and section spacing
Create typography scale (H1–H6, paragraph, small)
Create reusable Svelte components: Button, Card, SectionTitle, Badge
Test basic grid + flex layout responsiveness

phases.title: Global Layout and Navigation
phases.goal: Build site-wide header, footer, and base structure
tasks: Create Navbar.svelte with logo + tagline + category dropdowns
Add links: Home, Divisions, Studio, Technology, Contact
Create Footer.svelte with quick links, copyright, and social icons
Make Navbar sticky and dark-theme compatible
Add global transition animations on route change

phases.title: Hero Section (Landing Page Intro)
phases.goal: Cinematic introduction for Quantum Rishi Ecosystem
tasks: Create HeroSection.svelte
Headline: 'We Build Intelligent Autonomous Systems for a Secure, Scalable and Future-Ready India'
Add Subheadline: 'AI + Blockchain + Quantum-inspired Security — unified into one ecosystem'
Insert 3D background animation using Three.js (cosmic particle field)
Add CTAs: 'Launch QR Studio' and 'Explore Ecosystem'
Animate hero text with GSAP fade + upward reveal

phases.title: Landing Page – Meta-Category Layout
phases.goal: Create categorized grid layout for all divisions
tasks: Create Section: Digital Core, Applied Tech, Knowledge Systems, R&D & Vision
Each section header = SectionTitle component with neon underline
Each section grid = 5x2 responsive cards (divisions)
Hover: glow + display division tagline
Click: navigate to /divisions/[slug]

phases.title: Division Data System
phases.goal: Centralize data of all divisions and modules
tasks: Create /lib/data/divisions.json with structure:
{ 'qr.ai': { name: 'QR.AI', category: 'Digital Core', tagline: 'AI & ML Systems', color: '#28E5FF', services: ['LLM fine-tuning','Computer Vision','Predictive Analytics'] } }
Create DivisionsStore.ts to load JSON and export readable store
Connect landing grid to dynamic JSON data

phases.title: Dynamic Division Routing
tasks: Create /src/routes/divisions/[slug]/+page.svelte
Use load() to fetch matching data from divisions.json
Add hero with division color + animated background
Render key modules / services as cards
Add CTA: 'Open Platform →' linking to planned sub-domain

phases.title: Division-Specific Layout Variations
phases.goal: Give each division unique content type layout
tasks: Add conditional layouts: Technical, Creative, or Knowledge
Example: QR.AI shows architecture diagram; QR.Digi shows media slider
Use component variants (TechLayout, CreativeLayout, EduLayout)
Apply accent colors automatically via data.color

phases.title: Modules System (Nested under Divisions)
phases.goal: Enable clickable module-level pages linking to sub-domains
tasks: Create folder: /src/routes/divisions/[slug]/modules/[module]/+page.svelte
Each module pulls data from modules.json (sub-collection of divisions)
Add CTA button redirecting to corresponding sub-domain (e.g. ai.quantum-rishi.com)
Style module cards with glowing hover effect

phases.title: Motion & Interaction Enhancements
phases.goal: Polish user experience with high-end animation
tasks: Integrate GSAP ScrollTrigger for section reveals
Add parallax scroll on hero and cosmic background
Create smooth scroll navigation across category sections
Implement hover pulse animations on CTA buttons

phases.title: Global Responsiveness & Accessibility
tasks: Optimize all sections for mobile-first design
Add ARIA labels and keyboard navigation for major components
Use prefers-reduced-motion for animation fallback
Ensure text contrast meets WCAG AA standards

phases.title: SEO + Meta Data System
phases.goal: Integrate automatic SEO and social share metadata
tasks: Add title + meta description from divisions.json
Implement dynamic OG tags per page
Add structured schema.org data for SoftwareApplication type
Integrate sitemap.xml + robots.txt

phases.title: Performance Optimization
phases.goal: Fine-tune build output for speed and scalability
tasks: Enable code splitting and lazy loading for heavy assets
Use image optimization and compression for icons/backgrounds
Test Lighthouse (target >90)
Implement Cloudflare cache headers

phases.title: Testing & QA
phases.goal: Automate tests for UI and navigation
tasks: Add Playwright for e2e testing of routing
Check mobile viewport scaling
Verify animation smoothness under 60fps
Fix any console errors

phases.title: Deployment & Domain Configuration
phases.goal: Publish working site and connect domain
tasks: Connect repo to Cloudflare Pages project
Set build command: `pnpm run build`
Verify base path routing works correctly
Connect domain: quantum-rishi.com
Verify HTTPS + redirects

phases.title: Future Sub-Domain Preparation
phases.goal: Prepare base templates for each future micro-site
tasks: Inside /apps create folders: ai, block, cloud, cyber, digi, studio, labs, future
Add README.md + minimal +page.svelte placeholder
Prepare DNS entries for each (ai.quantum-rishi.com etc.)
Add Turborepo workspace config for future separation
